website_summaries.verdict: Leaves a blush on cheeks and lips for a natural look that wears all day long.
pros: Available in several attractive shades that look great with most skin tones
Creamy stain gives a natural glow, and can be worn on lips and cheeks
cons: Takes a bit of practice to apply, and is a bit messy to use

customer_reviews.title: Everyone I know who uses this product has to try to pour it in another container or try to super glue a more study brush to the
customer_reviews.text: Nothing out there that makes your lips look so naturally colored. Would be a 5 star but the brush is sloppy and very difficult to use. I have no idea why the manufacturer has not changed the brush. Everyone I know who uses this product has to try to pour it in another container or try to super glue a more study brush to the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Tina W.

customer_reviews.title: I like the consistency of the bene tint red best
customer_reviews.text: I like the consistency of the bene tint red best. This one is thicker and somehow feels like less of a stain although it does the trick. I was also expecting an orange color tint. This one is more of a pink to my eyes. But I love benefit products and this supplier was authentic and delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: amy csanyi

customer_reviews.title: Product stays for a considerable time.
customer_reviews.text: The texture of the product made it easy to apply. I use it in place of blush.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Szkoda Baerwolf

customer_reviews.title: For a natural look that lasts
customer_reviews.text: I'm Asian with fair skin. My first impression was Cha Cha Tint is far too orange. However, when I blended it in, I had just a light tint. It's so natural, my mother-in-law looked straight at me and told me I don't wear makeup. It doesn't look like makeup, but that hint of color gives me a more youthful look. I like it. It's easy to apply. For someone who doesn't like spending time doing makeup, it just takes a few seconds. It lasts all day. I don't ever have to worry about it rubbing off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good!
customer_reviews.text: it's useful for my faded colored lips. but it does not last too long. but it's good for me! One thing that disturbs is when applying it to my lips.. it's really tickles.. i don't know if anyone else had same experience.. but it happens to me everytime i apply.
customer_reviews.author: kiwi

customer_reviews.title: favorite product!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite beauty products, I use just a couple dashes on each cheek and swipe across my lips in the morning and I have a beautiful natural glow that lasts all day. It's a very pretty shade of peach which blends with my tanned skin so well, it's hard to tell that I'm wearing make up at all! It looks like I just came back from a nice light jog and am fresh faced and dewy. Love it! I'm on my 3rd bottle now after using it for almost 3 years! a little goes a long way..
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Neither Longlasting Nor a Flattering Color
customer_reviews.text: This is a very flamboyant shade of orange/pink, and as with most so-called stains, it does not wear well. Benefit is a good company, so I thought I would try this, but alas...
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer22

customer_reviews.title: It's terrible
customer_reviews.text: It is Terrible thing!!! Originally, Chachatint is liquid thing but it is not. It can not be use it because they all almost solid. This Chachatint is terrible. Also, Seller told that if i removed bad feedback, they promised to refund full my money back. But,after i removed it, they didn't contact me and they didn't refund my money back. Liar.
customer_reviews.author: B Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Cheek Color Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I never really used blush until I started using this and it's great. I also use this instead of bronzer. It is the only cheek color thing I use and it works great. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Work best but it comes in a 4 small bottles instead ...
customer_reviews.text: Work best but it comes in a 4 small bottles instead of a big one. They should have made it clear before selling it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie1030

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a quick color on cheeks or lips.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for a pop a color, just can't use too much. Nice for lips and cheeks. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine33

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I need an orange based tint and this is halfway between peach and coral. Looks coral, but applies peach. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Cha Cha tint is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I never wore blush before but wanted a way to brighten up my face and this did the trick. definitely recommend for women with Olive or darker skin tones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect neutral color
customer_reviews.text: This tint has a perfectly neutral coral tint. It leans neither orange nor pink--just right in between. This works really well for me because I have warm red hair but cool fair skin, so this color doesn't clash with either (it's tough for me to find such colors!). I think this color would work for a lot of people. It's very build-able as well: you can have just the subtlest glow or build up to a pop of color.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Stays long and gives a youthful glow
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Stays long. Natural color. Gives a youthful glow
customer_reviews.author: Hemi

customer_reviews.title: Great sunkissed look
customer_reviews.text: I love gel type cheek stains for their natural look but have a hard time finding good ones. Clinique quit making theirs so I tried this cha cha tint. It appears very orangy when it comes from the bottle and it has a slight sheen to it. I take the brush and swipe a stripe diagonally along my cheek bones and blend it in. It looks like I just spent a couple of hours in the sun (I have olive skin). It looks gorgeous. The slight shimmer really wakes up more mature skin. The texture of mine is a thicker liquid, not solid at all. I just love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Terryh

customer_reviews.title: Great tint!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tint! It has a milky consistency and a very impressive staying power.
customer_reviews.author: becky landon

product_meta.title: Benefit Cosmetics Chachatint Mango Tinted Cheek & Lip Stain 0.42 FL OZ
product_meta.description: A sheer mango-tinted stain for lips & cheeks Features a smooch-proof & smudge-proof formula Adds a tropical coral hue to lips & cheeks Gives a natural brilliant finish that lasts for hours
feature_bullets: Cha Cha Tint (Mango Tinted Lip & Cheek Stain)
